name: Flatmania
description:
Defeat the spread of hoax. Use skills to reduce hoaxes in population

  • Chat - talk some sense to people (unlimited)
  • Facts - spread facts (area)
  • Dart - throw a sleep dart (also slows)
  • New Brain - brain transplantation

Hint:

  • check the eyes for hoax level

Controls:

  • WASD + mouse for movement and targeting
  • Q/E or mouse wheel to scroll through skills

Tools used: Unity, VS2017 Community, paint.net
